SEARCH
Module net.cnoga.paint
Package net.cnoga.paint.core.util

Class SubwindowUtil

java.lang.Object
net.cnoga.paint.core.util.SubwindowUtil
public final class SubwindowUtil extends Object
Utility class for creating and positioning subwindows (secondary Stage instances) relative to a main JavaFX application window.

Provides methods to:

  • Create simple subwindows from FXML
  • Create toggle-linked subwindows that sync with a ToggleButton
  • Anchor subwindows at relative positions on the main stage

  • Method Details

    • createSubwindow

      public static javafx.stage.Stage createSubwindow(String title, String fxmlPath, javafx.stage.Stage mainStage, boolean resizable, double x, double y)
      Creates a new subwindow from an FXML file.
      Parameters:
      title - title of the subwindow
      fxmlPath - classpath-relative path to the FXML file
      mainStage - the owning stage (used for modality and positioning)
      resizable - whether the window should be resizable
      x - initial x-coordinate
      y - initial y-coordinate
      Returns:
      the created Stage
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the FXML resource is not found
      RuntimeException - if the FXML fails to load

    • createToggledSubwindow

      public static javafx.stage.Stage createToggledSubwindow(String title, String fxmlPath, javafx.stage.Stage mainStage, boolean resizable, double x, double y, javafx.scene.control.ToggleButton toggleButton)
      Creates a new subwindow tied to a ToggleButton. When the subwindow is closed manually, the toggle button will be fired to keep its state consistent.
      Parameters:
      title - title of the subwindow
      fxmlPath - classpath-relative path to the FXML file
      mainStage - the owning stage
      resizable - whether the window should be resizable
      x - initial x-coordinate
      y - initial y-coordinate
      toggleButton - the toggle button associated with the window
      Returns:
      the created Stage

    • setSubwindowSpawnPoint

      public static void setSubwindowSpawnPoint(javafx.stage.Stage subStage, javafx.stage.Stage mainStage, AnchorTypes anchorType)
      Positions a subwindow relative to a main window using an anchor.
      Parameters:
      subStage - the subwindow to position
      mainStage - the main stage to anchor against
      anchorType - where to anchor the subwindow
